trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> event that occurs when a user drags a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control with the mouse..
trans-unit.target: 相關資訊提供<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref>發生於使用者拖曳時的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>滑鼠控制...

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相對於螢幕座標的按一下滑鼠的水平位移<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset of the mouse click with respect to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相對於螢幕座標的按一下滑鼠的垂直位移<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal offset of the mouse click relative to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對於螢幕座標的按一下滑鼠的水平位移<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the upper-left corner of the bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相對於的週框方塊的左上角，按一下滑鼠的水平位移<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts a method that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> event to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 將處理的方法，轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler"></xref>型別。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the `genericHandler` as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler>.
Gets the vertical offset of the mouse click relative to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對於螢幕座標的按一下滑鼠的垂直位移<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the upper-left corner of the bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相對於的週框方塊的左上角，按一下滑鼠的水平位移<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>。
